hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salamah bin Nubait that his father said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah delivering a Khutbah on the day of Arafat atop a red camel." (Hasan) Chpater 200. Delivering A Short Khutbah In 'Arafat

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ عَرَفَةَ عَلَى النَّاقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Khutbah On The Day Of Arfat Atop A Camel
